title: MAFS' Jessika Power passionately kisses a mystery woman in Cairns
text:
Extraordinary footage has surfaced of Married At First Sight's Jessika Power getting intimate with a female friend during a boozy weekend in Cairns earlier this month.

In a series of videos obtained by Daily Mail Australia, the 27-year-old passionately kisses a woman named Cherie in a swimming pool and on a hotel bed.

According to a source, the pair 'hooked up' during a Mad Monday girls' trip following the NRL Grand Final, but are 'just friends' and 'aren't dating'.

Girls gone wild! Extraordinary footage has surfaced of Married At First Sight's Jessika Power getting intimate with a female friend during a boozy weekend in Cairns earlier this month

Photos and videos from the holiday show the two women drinking, flirting and displaying what appear to be fresh matching tattoos.

They seemingly made no effort to hide their frisky behaviour, with an onlooker saying 'they wanted people to notice them'.

When approached for comment on Wednesday night, Jessika told Daily Mail Australia that she and Cherie are 'just mates'.

Hot stuff! In a series of videos obtained by Daily Mail Australia, the 27-year-old passionately kisses a woman named Cherie in a swimming pool (left) and on a hotel bed (right)

Friends... with benefits? According to a source, the pair 'hooked up' during a Mad Monday girls' trip following the NRL Grand Final, but are 'just friends' and 'aren't dating'

Pals: When approached for comment on Wednesday night, Jessika told Daily Mail Australia that she and Cherie pretended to be a couple so men wouldn't 'hit on' them

'She's a friend and gorgeous as! It was just a cheeky girl kiss,' Jessika said.

'We pretended to be engaged so we could just enjoy the celebrations without boys trying to hit on us. That's where the kiss came from... it worked a treat!

'I'm single right now and I'm sure you guys will be the first to hear when I'm in a proper relationship.'

A weekend to remember! Photos from the holiday show the two women drinking and flirting

Twinning! Jessika and Cherie also showed off their fresh matching tattoos

'They wanted people to notice them': The pair made no effort to hide their frisky behaviour

Jessika rose to fame on Married At First Sight earlier this year. She was paired with Mick Gould on the show, before having an 'affair' with Dan Webb.

Since splitting with Dan in April, she has dated convicted killer Sam Abdulrahim, MAFS season four star Nick Furphy and Bachelorette contestant Matt Whyatt.

She is currently single and ready to mingle, with rumours swirling she could make an appearance on Love Island as an intruder in the coming weeks.

Good times! Jessika and Cherie took endless selfies during their girls' weekend in Cairns

Caught! The two women were spotted by the paparazzi as they strolled through their resort

Hmm! At one stage, heavily-tattooed Cherie glanced at Jessika bottom as the pair got close

Jessika revealed last week that she hopes to confront one of the show's contestants, Vanessa Sierra, who is the ex-girlfriend of her brother Rhyce.

She told KIIS FM she wants 'to go in there and straighten things up' after Vanessa, whom she described as a 'social climber', had badmouthed her on social media.

'I think it would be fun to go in and, you know, have a little bit of a laugh with it and try to find someone potentially [to date],' she added.
description: Extraordinary footage has surfaced of Married At First Sight's Jessika Power getting intimate with a female friend during a boozy weekend in Cairns earlier this month.
authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
